title: League of Legends Discord Server

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
DISCORD SERVER LINK: https://discord.gg/yRUph2m

This is a Discord server dedicated to League of Legends players on the Oceanic server.


Join to get instant Member role when a moderator or admin is online

Music Bot - Plays music
S@20 Bot - Posts new and updates from surrender@20 in the discord for everyone to look at faster
and more to come.
-Leveling Up

You can level up by chatting. Type t!profile to see your level!

-League Rank
You are given a discord role based on your in-game rank :)
